Indian Economy.title: Can GDP ‘nowcasts’ help a data-strapped RBI formulate monetary policy? It’s worth a try
Indian Economy.summary: India’s GDP figures arrive with long lags and frequent revisions, while monetary policy needs to be forward-looking. Could ‘nowcasting’ based on a wide range of early indicators offer a solution? A closer look reveals promise, complexity and a crucial caveat.

Indian Economy.title: Tax cuts dent revenue growth, less scope for fiscal policy support to economy: Moody's
Indian Economy.summary: As per the data, only 43.3 per cent of the budget estimates of tax collection was achieved till September of FY26, as against 49 per cent achieved in the corresponding period of FY25

Indian Economy.title: Indian economy to cross $4 trillion in FY26: Nageswaran
Indian Economy.summary: India's economy is projected to surpass $4 trillion in FY26, emphasizing growth amid global geopolitical shifts, says Chief Economic Advisor Nageswaran.

Indian Economy.title: Exercise caution over rate cut
Indian Economy.summary: A status quo in monetary policy is needed, as independent of base effect, there’s a q-o-q price build-up

Indian Economy.title: Ind-Ra ups India’s FY26 growth projection to 7%
Indian Economy.summary: India Ratings and Research (Ind-Ra) on Tuesday raised India's GDP growth projection for the current fiscal to 7 per cent on the back of high growth in the June quarter and less impact of the US tariff hike on global growth and trade.

Startups & Funding.title: Wipro Consumer Care VC plans exits, sharpens focus on packaged foods
Startups & Funding.summary: Wipro Consumer Care Ventures is transitioning to a second fund of  ₹250 crore after fully deploying its first fund this year It aims to invest in packaged foods and pet care, with plans for three to four investments annually.

Technology Sector.summary: Meghalaya’s East Khasi Hills district has imposed a night curfew within one km of the India-Bangladesh border to prevent infiltration by illegal migrants, militant groups, and smuggling networks.
